title: Meta-analysis of interactions

title: Compute interaction effect sizes — factorial_effsize
text: effsize Character. Effect‐size metric compute. Supported: "lnrr" "smd". colnames Character vector length 2 giving names use factors B Ctrl_mean Mean outcome Control treatment Ctrl_sd Standard deviation control treatment Ctrl_n Sample size control streatment A_mean Mean outcome treatment A_sd Standard deviation treatment A_n Sample size treatment B_mean Mean outcome B treatment B_sd Standard deviation B treatment B_n Sample size B treatment AB_mean Mean outcome interaction AxB treatment AB_sd Standard deviation interaction AxB treatment AB_n Sample size interaction AxB treatment data Data fram data.

title: Compute interaction effect sizes — factorial_effsize
text: original data effect size variance appended, named colnames.

title: Compute interaction effect sizes — factorial_effsize
text: Facundo Decunta - fdecunta@agro.uba.ar

title: Compute interaction effect sizes — factorial_effsize
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ fake_data <- factorial_effsize(   effsize = "lnrr",   colnames = c("Herb", "Fert"),   data = fake_data,   Ctrl_mean = C_mean,   Ctrl_sd = C_sd,   Ctrl_n = C_n,   A_mean = Herb_mean,   A_sd = Herb_sd,   A_n = Herb_n,   B_mean = Fert_mean,   B_sd = Fert_sd,   B_n = Fert_n,   AB_mean = HxF_mean,   AB_sd = HxF_sd,   AB_n = HxF_n ) } # }

what: Compute variance–covariance matrices for non-independent sampling variances — factorial_vcv
title: Compute variance–covariance matrices for non-independent sampling variances — factorial_vcv
text: Get multiple VCV matrices .

title: Compute variance–covariance matrices for non-independent sampling variances — factorial_vcv
code: factorial_vcv(vi_cols, cluster, obs, rho, data, ...)

title: Compute variance–covariance matrices for non-independent sampling variances — factorial_vcv
text: vi_cols Character vector. Names sampling-variance columns (e.g., "vi") VCV matrices computed. cluster Character string. Name column data identifies clustering unit (example, study ID). obs Character string. Name column indexing individual observations (effect sizes) within cluster. rho Numeric. Assumed intra-class correlation (0 1) used metafor::vcalc fill -diagonals. data data.frame containing cols, cluster, obs. ... Additional arguments passed straight metafor::vcalc.

title: Compute variance–covariance matrices for non-independent sampling variances — factorial_vcv
text: Quickly obtain one variance–covariance matrices account non-independence coming study, experiment, clustering unit. function thin wrapper around vcalc, looping columns listed cols returning resulting VCV matrices named list.

title: Compute variance–covariance matrices for non-independent sampling variances — factorial_vcv
text: Facundo Decunta - fdecunta@agro.uba.ar
